SapRfcMetaData.Description: Create and Change Material Master Data

ActivityConstraintBase.Description: To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Server field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the System Number field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Client field in the Property Sheet.
To run the SAP activity step, provide a value for the Username field in the Property Sheet.

GeneralProperties.name: GeneralProperties
GeneralProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="GeneralProperties" source="true" isSharedMetaData="true" displayName="General properties"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:types="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0"><xs:import namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" /><xs:element name="Arguments" types:displayName="Properties"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="StepId" type="xs:string" types:readonly="true" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Step Id" /><xs:element name="Name" default="BAPI_MATERIAL_SAVEDATA" type="xs:string" types:destination="false" types:displayName="Name" /><xs:element name="FunctionName" types:readonly="true" default="BAPI_MATERIAL_SAVEDATA" type="xs:string" types:argType="xml" types:configurable="true" types:displayName="Function name" /><xs:element name="Timeout" types:displayName="Timeout" type="xs:int" default="100000"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Time for performing RFC in ms</xs:documentation></xs:annotation></xs:element><xs:element name="ExpectException" type="xs:boolean" types:displayName="Expect Exception" types:configurable="false" /><xs:element name="ConnectionInfo"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Server" type="xs:string" default="10.0.16.14" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Server" /><xs:element name="SystemNumber" type="xs:string" default="00" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="System number" /><xs:element name="Client" type="xs:string" default="800" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Client" /><xs:element name="Username" type="xs:string" default="testuser" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Username" /><xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string" default="UNrrTkMjzFU310JjDiPgdw==" types:argType="xml" types:displayName="Password" types:masked="true" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element><xs:element name="UseTransaction" types:displayName="Transaction" type="xs:boolean" types:visible="true" types:source="true"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Transaction</xs:documentation></xs:annotation></xs:element></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema></Section>

InputProperties.name: InputProperties
InputProperties.SectionSchema: <Section name="InputProperties" source="true" dest="true" propertiesType="XML" showXmlControls="true" isSharedMetaData="true" displayName="Import"><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:import schemaLocation="..\..\..\dat\schemas\Types.xsd" namespace="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" /><xs:element name="Request"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Imports"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element minOccurs="0" name="CLIENTDATA"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Client-specific material data</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="DEL_FLAG"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Flag Material for Deletion at Client Level The string must be a single character.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="1" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="MATL_GROUP"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Material Group The string cannot exceed 9 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="9" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="OLD_MAT_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Old material number The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASE_UOM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Base Unit of Measure The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASE_UOM_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Base unit of measure in ISO code The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PO_UNIT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Purchase Order Unit of Measure The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PO_UNIT_ISO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Order unit in ISO code The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DOCUMENT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Document number (without document management system) The string cannot exceed 22 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="22" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DOC_TYPE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Document type (without Document Management system) The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DOC_VERS"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Document version (without Document Management system) The string cannot exceed 2 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="2" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DOC_FORMAT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Page format of document (without Document Management system) The string cannot exceed 4 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DOC_CHG_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Document change number (without document management system) The string cannot exceed 6 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="6" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PAGE_NO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Page number of document (without Document Management system) The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="NO_SHEETS"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Number of sheets (without Document Management system) The integer cannot exceed 3 digits.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction xmlns:q1="http://hp.vtd.schemas/types/v1.0" base="q1:numc"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PROD_MEMO"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Production/inspection memo The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="PAGEFORMAT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Page Format of Production Memo The string cannot exceed 4 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="4" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="SIZE_DIM"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Size/dimensions The string cannot exceed 32 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="32" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="BASIC_MATL"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Basic Material The string cannot exceed 48 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="48" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="STD_DESCR"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Industry Standard Description (such as ANSI or ISO) The string cannot exceed 18 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="18" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="DSN_OFFICE"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Laboratory/design office The string cannot exceed 3 characters.</xs:documentation></xs:annotation><xs:simpleType><xs:restriction base="xs:string"><xs:maxLength value="3" /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element /></xs:restriction></xs:simpleType></xs:element><xs:element name="STACK_FACT"><xs:annotation><xs:documentation>Stacking factor The integer value cannot exceed
